snippet.title: Borderlands 2: Mr. Torgue's Campaign of Carnage Trailer
snippet.description:
Check out the official trailer for Borderlands 2: Mr. Torgue's Campaign of Carnage DLC pack.

Follow Borderlands 2 at GameSpot.com!

Check out our review!
